sentences.en: ...an overland journey through Iraq, Turkey, Iran and Pakistan.
sentences.cn: …一趟途径伊拉克、土耳其、伊朗和巴基斯坦的陆路旅程。

sentences.en: An overland route from West Africa would save many vital days and some shipping.
sentences.cn: 从西非取道陆路的办法可能节省许多宝贵的时日和一些船舶.

sentences.en: If meteoric water does not evaporate or run overland, it may seep directly into the ground.
sentences.cn: 如果雨水不从陆地蒸发和流走的话, 就可能直接渗入地下.

sentences.en: Insurance covers both sea and overland transportation.
sentences.cn: 保险应包括水陆两路的运输.

sentences.en: Insurance covers both sea overland transportation.
sentences.cn: 保险应包括氺陆两路啲运输.

sentences.en: Militia leaders had halted overland food convoys in the region.
sentences.cn: 民兵首领已拦阻了该地区经由陆上运送食品的车队。

sentences.en: Mr. Ruan will then send the goods by air to Cambodia, or bring them overland.
sentences.cn: 阮先生会用空运或陆运再把货物运到柬埔寨.

sentences.en: Overland trucks carry food to market.
sentences.cn: 横越大陆的卡车把食品运往市场.

sentences.en: Silk, light and easily rolled up, could travel overland.
sentences.cn: 丝绸质轻而且容易卷起, 能够在陆路运输.

sentences.en: The goods are to be shipped to Vancouver, thence via Overland to Montreal.
sentences.cn: 货物由船运到温哥华, 再由温哥华陆运至蒙特利尔.

sentences.en: The Overland basically goes whole hog with navigation, a power tilting - and - telescoping steering wheel, and interior upgrades.
sentences.cn: 陆路去基本上与导航全猪, 电源倾斜和 - 伸缩的方向盘, 和内饰升级.

sentences.en: These winds have been traveling overland so they carry very little moisture.
sentences.cn: 这些横穿大陆的风含有极少的水分.

sentences.en: They decided to go by the overland route after all.
sentences.cn: 他们终究还是决定从陆路走.

sentences.en: They take the overland route to Egypt.
They were narrow enough to travel up rivers and, when necessary, light enough to transport overland.
sentences.cn: 船身狭窄得足以驶入江河上游, 必要时, 轻盈的船体可以经陆地运输.
他们正经由陆路去往巴格达。

trans.tran_cn: 陆上的，经由陆路的，横跨大陆的
trans.tran_en: An overland journey is made across land rather than by ship or aeroplane
